column1: The IMF said it's too early to assess the economic impact of the #coronavirus and that assessments will depend on how long it takes to control and eradicate the virus.

Chinese foreign ministry spokesperson Hua Chunying responds to @WHO 's #PHEIC decision: China has the confidence and capability to win the battle against #coronavirus and it is willing to work with @WHO and other countries to safeguard public health.

The World Health Organization has declared a Public Health Emergency of International Concern #PHEIC over the 2019 novel coronavirus 2019-nCoV. But it said that it has confidence in China's handling of the outbreak. #WHO

A 93-year-old coronavirus-infected patient has been cured in #Fuzhou, South China's Fujian province, Feb. 26, 2020. He's the oldest such patient to recover from the virus in the province. #COVID19 #FightingCoronavirus

So Useful and #Cute! Eight Tips for Prevention of #COVID19 from an Italian #Grandma. No kisses no hugs till the the epidemic is ended. However, winking is a good option for showing love. According to the grandma. #FightingCoronavirus

Back to the stage! The #ShanghaiBallet resumes its rehearsals after disruptions of the #CoronavirusOutbreak. Dancers wear masks and keep away from each other, but their moves are still elegant. #COVID19 #FightingCoronavirus

Preliminary lab results showed a new-type coronavirus had caused the outbreak of viral pneumonia in central #China's Wuhan. The newly detected coronavirus is different from known human coronavirus strains. pic.twitter.com/scRkKtH2BG

#Shanghai #Health Commission said on Sunday it has stepped up screening for suspected #coronavirus related pneumonia. https://www.shanghaieye.com.cn/shanghai-intensifies-screening-for-suspected-cases-on-coronavirus/ …pic.twitter.com/7T5LJzOWkA
The IMF said it's too early to assess the economic impact of the #coronavirus and that assessments will depend on how long it takes to control and eradicate the virus. pic.twitter.com/ZVkJP9NlvR
